SHOW.description: The name of the opera this playbill is about.

DATES.description: The dates the opera was shown. Can be a year only, if days are unclear.

ROLES.description: All roles of the cast and crew mentioned. Multiple people can be on a role in this case mention the role multiple times.

ROLE.description: All roles of the cast and crew mentioned. Multiple people can be on a role in this case mention the role multiple times. Examples can be: Conductor,Director,Set and Costume Designer,Supratitles,The Muse,Lindorf,Andr√©s,Nicklausse,Luther,Dr. Miracle,Musical Preparation,Chorusmaster,Assistant Director,Hair Designer,Make-up Designer,Stage Manager

ARTIST.description: Name of the person assigned to the role

OTHER.description: Sometimes there is additional information in addition to the artist like a language, a company name or whether it's the first or second artist. Leave empty if not found. Examples: 'Milan Italy', 'Seattle Opera Costume Shop', 'Gold', 'Silver', 'First', 'Second', 'Opera-in-English', 'The Greater Miami Opera Ass'm', etc.
